effect.x_y: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.

short_effect.x_y: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.

flavor_text.x_y: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.
